alert.note: Alert for Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:47AM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations up to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Pendleton County. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact travel Thursday night into Friday morning. Snow covered and slippery roads are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
